about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a unique fantasy world as you explore and interact with a wide variety of colourful characters. Engage in strategic turn-based battles alongside your trusted allies. Uncover the story as it unfurls across the diverse realms of this spellbinding role-playing game.

  • Create a character tailored to you by choosing from numerous customization options.
  • Unlock new members for your party as you progress.
  • Make use of clever tactics to best a wide variety of powerful foes on special battle maps.
  • Acquire a wide selection of new skills and magical items to aid you on your journey.
  • Discover a large and varied world as you delve into its story and its secrets.
detailed_description:
Steam Playtest

In order to collect feedback and improve the game while development is ongoing Conflux uses the steam playtest system. If you are interested in testing or just trying out the game at this stage, simply click the Request Access button on the playtest signup and it should automatically grant you access. Leaving feedback is optional but much appreciated. You can deliver feedback via the steam forums, discord or e-mail.

  • Test releases are going to be buggy, unfinished and likely not very fun to play. Feedback collected will be invaluable for addressing all of these issues and more.
